experience.description: Assisted in research focused on high-performance computing and algorithm optimization. Developed Python scripts to automate the execution of benchmark tests and managed a SQL database to store and analyze performance telemetry data.

Researched load-balancing strategies in distributed software architectures. Built a simulation environment using Python to model network traffic and implemented SQL-based logging to evaluate the efficiency of various routing algorithms.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
